text: The High Mountains of Portugal is a 2016 novel by Canadian author Yann Martel. The novel is split into three sections, each of which concerns a widower. At the 2016 Governor General's Awards, Christophe Bernard was shortlisted for the Governor General's Award for English to French translation for the novel's French translation, Les hautes montagnes du Portugal. ==References== Category:Novels by Yann Martel Category:2016 Canadian novels Category:English- language novels Category:Canadian magic realism novels
title: The High Mountains of Portugal
